TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathExpression extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供代表已編譯 XPath 運算式的具類型類別。

span.span: Provides a typed class that represents a compiled XPath expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會傳回的結果方法類別。This class is returned as the result of the method of the class. 它是以參數， ， ，和方法類別。It is a parameter to the , , , and methods of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 XPath 傳回型別來判斷如何處理 XPath 運算式。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，對 XPath 運算式所選取的節點進行排序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sorts the nodes selected by the XPath expression.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddSort (object expr, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);

Public MustOverride Sub AddSort (expr As Object, comparer As IComparer)
public: abstract void AddSort(System::Object ^ expr, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer);
abstract member AddSort : obj * System.Collections.IComparer -> unit

param.name: expr

span.span: An object representing the sort key.

param.span: 這可以是節點的 值或具有已編譯 XPath 運算式的 物件。

span.span: This can be the value of the node or an object with a compiled XPath expression.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 物件，提供特定資料型別比較，以比較兩個物件是否等價。

span.span: An object that provides the specific data type comparisons for comparing two objects for equivalence.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，根據指定的 物件，對 XPath 運算式所選取的節點進行排序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sorts the nodes selected by the XPath expression according to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓使用者排序物件依其資料型別，而不是字串或數字。The method enables users to sort objects by their data type instead of by string or number. 物件提供的實作支援使用者定義的類別的 排序的方法。The object provides an implementation of the method that supports sorting on user-defined classes. 在下列範例中，ISBN 號碼來排序書籍其中`isbn`是實作的物件介面。In the following example, the books are sorted by ISBN number, where `isbn` is an object that implements the interface. ```vb Dim expression As XPathExpression = navigator.Compile("bookstore/book") Dim isbn As ISBN = New ISBN() expression.AddSort("@ISBN", (IComparer)isbn) ``` ```csharp XPathExpression expression = navigator.Compile("bookstore/book"); ISBN isbn = new ISBN(); expression.AddSort("@ISBN", (IComparer)isbn); ``` 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 在其中加入排序的順序提供排序鍵的順序。The order in which the sorts are added provides the sort key order. - 如果或排序索引鍵需要命名空間解析，您必須使用方法以提供的命名空間解析。If the or the sort key requires namespace resolution, you must use the method to provide an for namespace resolution. - 如果不包含前置詞，則會假設命名空間統一資源識別元 (URI) 為空白的命名空間。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is the empty namespace. 如果您的 XML 包含預設命名空間，您仍然必須使用方法，並提供包含前置詞和命名空間來處理的預設命名空間 URI。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace.

exception.span: 或排序鍵包含前置詞，而且未提供 或所提供的 中找不到前置詞。

span.span: The or sort key includes a prefix and either an is not provided, or the prefix cannot be found in the supplied .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddSort (object expr, System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder order, System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder caseOrder, string lang, System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType dataType);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddSort(object expr, valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder order, valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder caseOrder, string lang, valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType dataType) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub AddSort (expr As Object, order As XmlSortOrder, caseOrder As XmlCaseOrder, lang As String, dataType As XmlDataType)

public: abstract void AddSort(System::Object ^ expr, System::Xml::XPath::XmlSortOrder order, System::Xml::XPath::XmlCaseOrder caseOrder, System::String ^ lang, System::Xml::XPath::XmlDataType dataType);
abstract member AddSort : obj * System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder * System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder * string * System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType -> unit

param.name: expr

span.span: An object representing the sort key.

param.span: 這可以是節點的 值或具有已編譯 XPath 運算式的 物件。

span.span: This can be the value of the node or an object with a compiled XPath expression.
An value indicating the sort order.

param.name: caseOrder
param.span: 值會表示如何排序大寫和小寫字母。

span.span: An value indicating how to sort uppercase and lowercase letters.

param.name: lang

span.span: The language to use for comparison.

param.span: 使用 類別，該類別可被傳遞至語言類型的 方法，例如 "us-en" 代表美國。英文。

span.span: Uses the class that can be passed to the method for the language types, for example, "us-en" for U.S. English.

param.span: 如果指定空字串，則此系統環境會用來判斷 。

span.span: If an empty string is specified, the system environment is used to determine the .

param.name: dataType
param.span: 值會表示資料類型的排序次序。

span.span: An value indicating the sort order for the data type.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中進行覆寫時，根據提供的參數來排序 XPath 運算式所選取的節點。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sorts the nodes selected by the XPath expression according to the supplied parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 在其中加入排序的順序提供排序鍵的順序。The order in which the sorts are added provides the sort key order. - 如果或排序索引鍵需要命名空間解析，您必須使用方法以提供的命名空間解析。If the or the sort key requires namespace resolution, you must use the method to provide an for namespace resolution. - 如果不包含前置詞，則會假設命名空間統一資源識別元 (URI) 為空白的命名空間。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is the empty namespace. 如果您的 XML 包含預設命名空間，您仍然必須使用方法，並提供包含前置詞和命名空間來處理的預設命名空間 URI。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何依價格遞減順序排序叢書文件。The following example shows how to sort the books document by price in descending order. [!code-vb[XPathXMLExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/vb/xpathexpression.addsort.vb#4)] [!code-csharp[XPathXMLExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/cs/xpathexpression.addsort.cs#5)] 該範例採用 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

exception.span: 或排序鍵包含前置詞，而且未提供 或所提供的 中找不到前置詞。

span.span: The or sort key includes a prefix and either an is not provided, or the prefix cannot be found in the supplied .

span.span: An XPath expression.

summary.span: 編譯指定的 XPath 運算式，並傳回代表 XPath運算式的 物件。

span.span: Compiles the XPath expression specified and returns an object representing the XPath expression.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 運算式會評估得出下列一種結果類型。An XPath expression is evaluated to yield one of the following result types. - - - - > [!NOTE] > 如果 XPath 運算式中，指定具有無效的引數 （或未實作的使用者定義函式） 數目，則只有在執行階段發生例外狀況。If a user-defined function with an invalid number of arguments (or an unimplemented user-defined function) is specified in the XPath expression, an exception occurs only at run time. 使用者定義函數不會在編譯時期檢查和執行評估運算式時，才會發生例外狀況所導致的使用者定義函數。User-defined functions are not checked at compile time and exceptions that result from user-defined functions occur only if execution evaluates the expression. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 XPath 傳回型別來判斷如何處理 XPath 運算式。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression. 此範例會使用方法以傳回新物件。The example uses the method to return the new objects. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

exception.span: XPath 運算式參數不是有效的 XPath 運算式。

span.span: The XPath expression parameter is not a valid XPath expression.
The XPath expression is not valid.

span.span: An XPath expression.

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 物件，實作命名空間解析的 介面。

span.span: An object that implements the interface for namespace resolution.

summary.span: 以為命名空間解析指定的 物件，編譯指定的 XPath 運算式，並傳回表示 XPath 運算式的 物件。

span.span: Compiles the specified XPath expression, with the object specified for namespace resolution, and returns an object that represents the XPath expression.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 運算式會評估得出下列一種結果類型。An XPath expression is evaluated to yield one of the following result types. - - - - > [!NOTE] > 如果 XPath 運算式中，指定具有無效的引數數目 （或未實作的使用者定義函式），則只有在執行階段發生例外狀況。If a user-defined function with an invalid number of arguments (or an unimplemented user-defined function) is specified in the XPath expression, an exception occurs only at run-time. 使用者定義函數不會在編譯時期檢查和執行評估運算式時，才會發生例外狀況所產生的使用者定義函數。User-defined functions are not checked at compile time and exceptions resulting from user-defined functions occur only if execution evaluates the expression. > [!NOTE] > 不可能編譯藉由傳遞的一個步驟中的自訂內容，它會實作，做為引數給這個方法。It is not possible to compile a with a custom context in one step by passing an , which implements , as an argument to this method. 若要使用與自訂內容，您必須呼叫編譯運算式之後的方法。To use a with a custom context, you must call the method after compiling the expression.

exception.span: XPath 運算式參數不是有效的 XPath 運算式。

span.span: The XPath expression parameter is not a valid XPath expression.
The XPath expression is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 XPath 傳回型別來判斷如何處理 XPath 運算式。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 實作 介面的物件，用於命名空間解析。

span.span: An object that implements the interface to use for namespace resolution.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，指定 物件用於命名空間解析。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, specifies the object to use for namespace resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別可實作支援命名空間解析介面，例如類別。Namespace resolution is supported using classes that implement the interface, such as the class. 儲存前置詞和命名空間統一資源識別元 (URI) 的對應。The stores prefix and namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) mappings. 如果需要命名空間解析的前置詞和命名空間 URI 配對必須加入至物件，例如類別，它會實作介面，而必須呼叫方法，來指定介面的物件，用於命名空間解析。If the requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an object, such as the class, which implements the interface, and the method must be called to specify the interface object to use for namespace resolution. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果不包含前置詞，則會假設命名空間 URI 為空白的命名空間。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace. 如果您的 XML 包含預設命名空間，您仍然必須使用方法，並提供包含前置詞和命名空間來處理的預設命名空間 URI 的物件。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an object that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. - 您也可以提供介面物件的命名空間解析方法，當您建立您物件。You can also supply an interface object for namespace resolution to the method when you create your object. - 接受為命名空間解析程式，因此您可以實作自訂內容及使用函式和變數根據和。 accepts as a namespace resolver, so you can implement a custom context and use functions and variables based on and . XPath 運算式將會執行它們。The XPath expression will execute them. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用者定義函式和變數](~/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md)。For more information, see [User Defined Functions and Variables](~/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 XPath 傳回型別，以判斷如何處理 XPath 運算式，以及如何使用方法以提供命名空間解析的物件。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression, and how to use the method to provide an object for namespace resolution. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

span.span: The object parameter is not derived from .

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, specifies the object to use for namespace resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用支援命名空間解析儲存前置詞和命名空間統一資源識別元 (URI) 對應的類別。Namespace resolution is supported using the class which stores prefix and namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) mappings. 如果需要必須加入命名空間解析的前置詞和命名空間 URI 配對物件和必須呼叫方法，來指定物件用於命名空間解析。If the requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to the object and the method must be called to specify the object to use for namespace resolution. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果不包含前置詞，則會假設命名空間 URI 為空白的命名空間。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace. 如果您的 XML 包含預設命名空間，您仍然必須使用方法，並提供物件，其中包含前置詞和命名空間來處理的預設命名空間 URI。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an object that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. - 您也可以提供物件命名空間解析方法，當您建立您物件。You can also supply an object for namespace resolution to the method when you create your object. - 接受為命名空間解析程式，因此您可以實作自訂內容及使用函式和變數根據和。 accepts as a namespace resolver, so you can implement a custom context and use functions and variables based on and . XPath 運算式將會執行它們。The XPath expression will execute them. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用者定義函式和變數](~/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md)。For more information, see [User Defined Functions and Variables](~/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 XPath 傳回型別，以判斷如何處理 XPath 運算式，以及如何使用方法以提供命名空間解析的物件。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression, and how to use the method to provide an object for namespace resolution. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

exception.span: 物件參數並非衍生自 類別。

span.span: The object parameter is not derived from the class.
